ResolutionStep.description: This type describes a recommended step of the service-defined resolution.
ResolutionStep.longDescription: This type shall describe a recommended step of the service-defined resolution.  The set of recommended steps are used to resolve the cause of a log entry, an event, a condition, or an error message.

title: #ResolutionStep
